entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 4 except plus 1 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning early this evening. Flurries over the Highlands. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over the Highlands. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 4 except plus 1 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Flurries over the Highlands early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
